column1: # Maps tag identifiers used in taxonomy.yaml to human-readable descriptions.

column2: Prompt Injection — Manipulating inputs to override model instructions
Sensitive Information Disclosure — Model reveals private or confidential data
Supply Chain Vulnerabilities — Compromised components in the ML pipeline
Data and Model Poisoning — Tampered training data or model weights
Improper Output Handling — Unsafe use of model-generated content
Excessive Agency — Model takes unauthorized or excessive autonomous actions
System Prompt Leakage — Exposure of system-level instructions
Vector and Embedding Weaknesses — Exploits in RAG or embedding pipelines
Misinformation — Model generates false or misleading content
Unbounded Consumption — Resource exhaustion or denial-of-service via LLM
Software Vulnerability — Exploitable flaw in the system
Supply Chain Compromise — Tampering with dependencies or infrastructure
Model Compromise — Direct tampering with model artifacts
Software Compromise — Tampering with application code or dependencies
Information Leak — Unintended disclosure of sensitive information
Denial of Service — Degrading or preventing system availability
Adversarial Example — Crafted input designed to cause misclassification
Evasion — Input modified to bypass detection or filtering
Exfiltration — Unauthorized extraction of data from the system
Model Inversion — Recovering training data or model internals
Data Poisoning — Corrupting training or retrieval data
Ingest Poisoning — Poisoning data during ingestion into RAG/retrieval
Toxicity — Generating harmful, offensive, or abusive content
Disinformation — Generating false or misleading information
Context Relevance — Degraded performance due to irrelevant context
Prompt Extraction — Recovering system prompt or hidden instructions
Anthropomorphisation — Assigning human traits to the model
Impersonation — Model pretends to be a specific person or entity
Denial of Service — Overwhelming the system with excessive requests or data
Harmful Instructions — Generating instructions for dangerous activities
Weapon Instructions — Generating weapons manufacturing guidance
Cyber Weapon Instructions — Generating malware or exploit code
Manipulation — Psychologically manipulating users
Violation of Privacy — Exposing personal or private information
Demands for Personal Information — Requesting PII from users
Doxxing — Revealing identifying information about individuals
